Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: There is a high priority story for this already - FAB-8053 , which is being considered for the next generation lifecycle. I'm marking this as a duplicate, I've also referenced FAB-12292 in the text of FAB-8053 to ensure that the concern is not lost. It would likely be addressed by more dynamic endorsement policies such as any 1 channel org, any 2 orgs, majority of orgs, etc, which is being considered in FAB-8053. This way the endorsement policy would not have to change at all when channel membership changes.
